safe_des1: With this upgrade you get a safe that only special gang members can access.
safe_des2: This upgrade will increase the storage capacity of the safe.
scout1: Watch your enemies to get information about them!
scout2: You have successfully got the data on them!
scout3: The task could not be completed in time!
raid1: Stay on the enemy's HQ until time runs out!
raid2: Defend your HQ and kill your enemies!
stash_loot2: Now you can loot out the enemy's stash
body_disposal2: Drive to the location and pick up the body!
body_disposal5: Get the body bag out of the trunk!
body_disposal6: Put the body bag in the boat!
body_disposal7: Drop the body in the water at the designated place!
body_disposal9: Let's go back to the starting point!
drug1: Steal the van full of drugs!
drug3: Move the drugs to the other car.
drug4: Pick up the money from the customer!
homeless1: Catch and put the homeless man in the trunk!
homeless3: Put the homeless man in the customer's trunk!
homeless4: Pick up the money from the customer!
assasination1: Kill the target without getting close!
assasination2: Put the body on your shoulders!
assasination3: Put the body in the trunk!
assasination6: Pick up the money from the customer!
spray_des: Spray the city to the colors of your gang to earn reputation points
clean_des: Clean up other gang's graffities to earn reputation points
invite_des: Easily send and accept gang invitations to the streets together!
level_des: Level up your gang to unlock more member slots, powerful upgrades, and special perks. Grow stronger and dominate your rivals!
max_ranks_des: With this upgrade the gang leader can create more ranks.
raid_des: With this upgrade your gang will be able to start a raid against another gang.
raiding_question: Are you sure start raiding this gang?
name: NAME
vehicle_des: With this upgrade you can store more cars in the gang garage.
label: Label
stash_des: This upgrade will increase the storage capacity of the stash.
got_invitation: You have got an invitation to the following gang:
no_active_gangs: There are no active gangs in this zone
